EmailTemplate.description: FMS NOT HW - MFG manufactured by GE_Smiths-contact info
EmailTemplate.name: AT FMS NOT Honeywell
EmailTemplate.subject: AC not equipped with HW FMS {!Case.Quote_Number__c} {!Account.Name} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for providing the FMS PN which maps to a GE/Smiths/Thales FMS. We regret to inform you that Honeywell cannot provide NavDB service for a GE/Smiths/Thales FMS. Please contact one of the following for assistance in setting up NavDB service.
For Navtech - Navdata Customer Support, Office 44 1932 704213; email navdatasupport@navtech.aero WEB: www.navtech.aero
For Jeppesen Source Data - For the Western Hemisphere (Americas and Pacific) contact Mr. Josh Richardson; email Joshua.Richardson@jeppesen.com; For the Eastern Hemisphere (Europe, Middle East, Africa, China) contact Mr. Jorg Morke Joerg.Moerke@jeppesen.comemail:Joerg.Moerke@jeppesen.com; WEB: www.jeppesen.com;
For Lufthansa Systems Source Data - FMS Customer Support, Office 41 44 828 6565; email fms.support@lhsystems.com;
WEB: www.lhsystems.com
Please let us know if we can be of further assistance.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative
602-436-6739
Fax: 602-822-7333
email: AISACCOUNTSERVICES@HONEYWELL.COM
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact the Technical Operations Center at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
